head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VEREBAY, MAX. MAX VEREBAY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VEREBAY, MAX. MAX VEREBAY

block.p: VEREBAY-Max. Max Verebay, died on December 29, Boca Raton Florida. A friend, a mentor and our partner. He was a brilliant, dedicated and creative man. He enriched the lives of all those he touched. We extend our condolences to his wife Mollie, his children Hildi and Walter Black, Jodi and Leonard Verebay, and his grandchildren. Rosalie & Martin, Marnee & Eric
